name: Sword Cut Run
description:
Slash your way through hordes of enemies in Sword Cut Run, the new game that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Play as a skilled ninja warrior, armed with a powerful weapon and outstanding reflexes.
Run and jump as swiftly as the wind through a perilous landscape, slashing enemies coming your way.

Sword Cut Run will test your skills as you dodge obstacles, slay enemies, and execute deadly combos.
As you progress, you’ll unlock new blades and abilities to help you conquer even greater challenges.


Can you defeat the bosses that lurk at the end of each level?
There’s only one way to find out - download Sword Cut Run now and put your skills to the test!
